Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Kyznetskiy Inn, you'll be centrally located in Moscow, steps from Bolshoi Theatre and TSUM Department Store. This hotel is close to Red Square and St. Basil's Cathedral.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 27 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include desks and complimentary bottled water, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a health club, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at a coffee shop/café serving guests of Kyznetskiy Inn. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 12:00:00 Check-out time is 12:00:00
Satisfy your appetite at a coffee shop/café serving guests of Kyznetskiy Inn. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

With a stay at Kyznetskiy Inn, you'll be centrally located in Moscow, steps from Bolshoi Theatre and TSUM Department Store. This hotel is close to Red Square and St. Basil's Cathedral.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Bolshoi Theatre - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
TSUM Department Store - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Gulag History Museum - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Maly Theatre - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Sanduny Bath House - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Moscow Arts Theatre - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Yury Dolgoruky Monument - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Stanislavski and Nemirovich-Danchenko Moscow Academic Music Theatre - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
War of 1812 Museum - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Revolution Square - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
The State Literary Museum - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Manezh Square - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Resurrection Gate - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Alexander Gardens - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Vysokopetrovsky Monastery - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi

The preferred airport for Kyznetskiy Inn is Moscow (SVO-Sheremetyevo) - 26.1 km / 16.2 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
